Title: Enacts the "Equal Access to Health and Human Services for Limited English Speaking Individuals Act"
Summary: Enacts the "Equal Access to Health and Human Services for Limited English Speaking Individuals Act"; directs certain state agencies to provide language assistance services for persons seeking family assistance, health or labor services; requires record keeping; requires free translation for 22 languages.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to ensuring equal access to health and human services for limited English speaking individuals
